mapper.insert: INSERT admin_Notice ( notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_date ) VALUES ( noticeNo.NEXTVAL, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE FROM admin_Notice SET notice_category=#{noticeCategory}, notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, notice_content=#{noticeContent}, notice_date=#{noticeDate}, WHERE notice_writer=#{noticeWriter}
mapper.select: select Count(*) from admin_Notice where notice_category=#{type}
